definition: A term commonly employed to describe individuals engaged in activities that are against the law, often involving illegal or illicit behavior. It is typically used to refer to people who have committed criminal acts or are involved in criminal organizations.

examples.german: Die Polizei verhaftete den kriminellen Bandenführer
examples.english: The police arrested the criminal gang leader

examples.german: Sie wurde wegen krimineller Aktivitäten angeklagt
examples.english: She was charged with criminal activities

examples.german: Er hat eine lange Liste von kriminellen Vorstrafen
examples.english: He has a long list of criminal convictions
